funkcije.opis: A Polk Power Port minimizes turbulence, reducing noise and distortion that mask midrange clarity. Its front-firing configuration means accurate bass no matter where you place your subwoofer.
High-resolution 32-bit floating point processing with group delay-minimizing filters and precision limiters enables clearer bass with crisper transients.

Time-Smart Phase Control provides 360 degrees of phase adjustment centered around lowpass filter settings, ensuring precise system blending. Adjust polarity in 45-degree increments, displayed on LED indicators.
An adjustable 4th-order lowpass filter provides precise frequency control, for seamless integration with main speakers and superior overall system performance with open, balanced lows and mids.
An auto-sensing power supply reduces power consumption when the subwoofer is not in use.

opis: Featuring Bluetooth streaming, digital inputs and a built-in phono equalizer, the Denon PMA-600NE integrated amplifier sets new heights in audio performance and connectivity for the aspiring music enthusiast.

dodatne_informacije.tagline: 2 Ch. 45W Integrated Amplifier

funkcije.opis: Engineered with remarkable Denon amplifier technology, the PMA-600NE delivers 70 Watts of power-per-channel at 4 Ohm. This integrated amplifier offers compatibility with the widest range of speaker types and impedances for operational stability.
Experience high-resolution audio playback to enjoy the highest quality of your favorite songs

The PMA-600NE includes a phono equalizer that supports playing from sources with a MM cartridge. This phono equalizer has high gain, and unlike loops in other circuit board patterns which cause adverse effects on sound quality, the simple, straightforward design, significantly improves sound.
To eliminate interference and maintain exceptional sound quality, the transformer has separate coiled wires for audio and control circuits.

opis: The Denon PMA-3000NE delivers 160W per channel at 4 ohms and 80W per channel at 8 ohms, driving even the most demanding speaker to deliver superior sound in any scenario. Designed and manufactured at Denon facilities in Shirakawa, Japan.

dodatne_informacije.tagline: 2 Ch. 80W Integrated Amplifier with MM/MC phono stage

funkcije.opis: The PMA-3000NE delivers 80W/channel into 8 ohms and 160W/channel into 4 ohms. Its Advance UHC-MOS Single Push-pull Circuit and differential 1-stage amplifier drive demanding speakers with exceptional clarity and linearity.

Denon's Ultra AL32 Processing uses interpolation algorithms to produce highresolution output. Supporting input signals up to 384kHz/32-bit, it upsamples for smoother waveforms and improved sound reproduction.

The PMA-3000NE's phono stage supports both MM and MC cartridges for truest vinyl reproduction in any setup. A high-gain design and “simple and straight” circuitry minimize distortion for pure, detailed sound.
The PMA-3000NE’s versatile digital connections, including optical, coaxial, and USB Type B, support up to 384kHz/32-bit and 11.2MHz DSD audio.

Analog mode bypasses digital circuitry for a pure, all-analog sound. A Source Direct function bypasses the tone controls so that the signal path is as short and clean as possible, for enhanced clarity.

glavne_funkcije: Optical, coaxial, and USB digital connections

The PMA-1700NE embraces electrical volume, balance, and tone controls while preserving the analog feeling of operation. The unique mechanism offers smooth, linear control.

funkcije.opis: The amplifier circuit delivers 2x30W - more than enough power to drive either the matching SC-M41 speakers or other popular choices (the CD receiver can be bought separately).
Connect your TV, gaming console, or media player to the D-M41 with an optical cable and amplify your gaming experience or bring other content to life with better audio quality.
Stream music from your favourite music services with D-M41. Connect your smart device and enjoy virtually endless songs, podcasts and online radio stations.

Denon’s popular M series gives you high sound quality based on the “simple & straight” concept. This circuit design and the way the chassis is built ensure that the sound you hear is utterly faithful to the original performance.
Sized at 210mm W x 310mm D it allows for an easy setup on a bookshelf, in a bedroom, or in a home office.

opis: The Denon DCD-3000NE provides pristine SACD/CD and DSD playback via a 384kHz/32-bit DAC and Ultra AL32 Processing. Patented vibration suppression and premium components deliver distortion-free sound. Meticulous tuning ensures the truest sonic reproduction.

An advanced DAC in quad configuration produces clean sound with incredible spaciousness, robust detail, and an incredibly wide dynamic range.

Denon's Ultra AL32 Processing uses interpolation algorithms to produce high-resolution output. Supporting input signals up to 384kHz/24-bit, it upsamples for smoother waveforms and improved sound reproduction.
Pure Direct mode disables the display and digital outputs to minimize interference that might color the audio signal. All you’ll hear is clean, detailed, accurate sound.
Denon's patented S.V.H. (Suppress Vibration Hybrid) drive mechanism ensures each disc loads quickly and spins precisely, for superior data reading accuracy.

funkcije.naslov: Designed to reduce vibration and interference
funkcije.opis: Built with specifically fitted power transformers and increased physical separation between the different audio and digital boards, reducing both vibration and interference.
Backed by a more than 110-year legacy of designing premium audio components, the overall aesthetic, sound quality, and design integrity are built to last.

opis: Designed and manufactured in Japan, the powerful AVR-X4800H drives 9.4 channels of amplification. With Dolby Atmos and DTS:X, plus IMAX Enhanced and Auro 3D, the AVR-X4800H envelops larger living spaces in breathtaking 3D audio. With HEOS®, wirelessly stream your favorite music.

dodatne_informacije.tagline: 9.4 Ch. 125W 8K AV Receiver with HEOS® Built-in

funkcije.opis: At Denon’s state-of-the-art facility, traditional craftsmanship, modern innovation, and rigorous standards come together to create high-performance components built to last.

Lose yourself in breathtaking 360-degree sound with Dolby Atmos, DTS:X, Auro-3D, and IMAX Enhanced. Experience immersive audio that surrounds you from every direction, pulling you deeper into movies, music, and games.
With seven 8K-ready HDMI inputs and three outputs, enjoy stunning visuals with HDR10+ and Dolby Vision. Ultra-low latency ensures a smooth, lag-free gaming experience.
Enhance performance with room correction options from Audyssey (installed) or Dirac Live® Room Correction and Dirac Live® Bass Control (optional).
Perfect your sound with built-in Audyssey calibration, or dive deeper with optional Dirac Live for expert-level system tuning tailored to your space.

opis: The Denon DHT-C210 is a slender sound bar featuring two powerful, built-in down-firing subwoofers and Dolby Atmos 3D audio technology to create a surround sound experience without a separate subwoofer. Quickly connect devices through the HDMI (eARC) and Optical inputs or stream music via Bluetooth.

funkcije.opis: Easy setup with a single HDMI connection to your TV using Enhanced Audio Return Channel (eARC).
Send the audio from the streaming apps built into your smart TV to the sound bar with 4K UHD HDMI (1in / 1out with eARC) via the included HDMI cable.
Denon Dialog Enhancer improves dialogue clarity with three different modes—ideal for movies and TV shows. Turn up the dialogue without having to adjust the overall volume.
At 2” (60mm) tall, the Denon DHT-C210 can be placed in front of your TV without blocking its bottom edge or can be easily mounted.
With four different sound modes— Movie, Night, Music, and Pure—you can choose the perfect mode for any occasion.

Enjoy breathtaking video quality with support for 8K/60Hz and 4K/120Hz pass-through, plus advanced HDR formats like Dolby Vision, HDR10+, and HLG. The AVR-S570BT’s four HDMI inputs and one output support the latest standards, so you’re ready for today’s content and tomorrow’s upgrades. Denon’s advanced upscaling breathes new life into legacy video content.

Get up and running in minutes with Denon’s award-winning setup assistant featuring step-by-step visual instructions. Keep things speedy and simple with Quick Select buttons that let you store and retrieve your favorite audio settings.
Built-in Bluetooth makes it easy to stream music from your favorite sources. Enjoy playlists, podcasts, and more with the rich, detailed sound only Denon can deliver.

Experience your music in stunning clarity and detail, thanks to support for high-resolution formats including ALAC, FLAC, and WAV (up to 192kHz/24-bit), plus DSD 2.8/5.6MHz playback. Stream from your favorite services, or play files from USB and networked drives. Even compressed formats like MP3 and WMA sound better on a Denon.

opis: Enjoy incredible 8K video and enveloping 3D audio from the AVR-S970H. Fill medium-size rooms with more refined sound from a 7.2 or 5.2.2 setup with Dolby Atmos and DTS:X. And with HEOS®, wirelessly stream online music and share with HEOS-enabled speakers in other rooms.

funkcije.naslov: Immersive sound, above and around you
funkcije.opis: Feel like you’re inside every moment with immersive 3D audio from Dolby Atmos and DTS:X. Set up a full 5.2.2 system for true overhead effects, or enjoy virtual overhead immersion from Dolby Atmos Height Virtualization and DTS Virtual:X—even without height speakers. Legacy content also gets a major upgrade with Dolby Surround and DTS Neural:X upmixing.

funkcije.naslov: Bring big screen energy with advanced HDMI
funkcije.opis: Enjoy stunning clarity and dynamic color with 4K/120Hz and 8K/60Hz video support on three HDMI inputs and one output. With pass-through for HDR10+, Dolby Vision, HLG, and Dynamic HDR, every frame is optimized for deeper contrast and lifelike brightness. Denon’s advanced upscaling enhances legacy content, bringing new depth and dimension to everything you watch.

Denon’s award-winning setup assistant features step-by-step visual instructions to help you get your system up and running in minutes. Use built-in Audyssey MultEQ room calibration software to optimize sound for your space, and simplify switching between favorite audio settings with Quick Select buttons.

Built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth let you stream music your way—whether it’s direct from your device or over your home network. Enjoy effortless playback with AirPlay 2, including your favorite tracks from Apple Music.
